price: 90. Ils disent : « Nous ne croirons pas en toi avant que tu ne fasses  jaillir de la terre une source (inépuisable),
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَن نُّؤۡمِنَ لَكَ حَتَّىٰ تَفۡجُرَ لَنَا مِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَنۢبُوعًا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waqālū lan nu'mina laka ḥattā tafjura lanā mina al-arḍi yanbūʿan
